testsuite.name: tests.SD2_Invalid_Credentials_Login

testcase.name: test_SD2_Invalid_Credentials_Login
testcase.system-out: 1. Navigate to: https://www.saucedemo.com Navigated to https://www.saucedemo.com/ 2. Write username: 'invalid_user' 3. Write password: 'wrong_password' 4. click 'Login' button Element clicked Successfully Signed In with the INVALID account 5. Verify 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service' error message Error message displayed correctly 6. Verify page stays in LoginPage Current page: 'https://www.saucedemo.com/'

testsuite.system-out: 1. Navigate to: https://www.saucedemo.com Navigated to https://www.saucedemo.com/ 2. Write username: 'invalid_user' 3. Write password: 'wrong_password' 4. click 'Login' button Element clicked Successfully Signed In with the INVALID account 5. Verify 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service' error message Error message displayed correctly 6. Verify page stays in LoginPage Current page: 'https://www.saucedemo.com/'
